## Author Index
```{r echo=FALSE}
read_xlsx('./data/MM2024-data.xlsx', sheet = 'Author Index') |>
  kbl() |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
